amountWithdrawable(uint256,address,uint2.details: Return the sum of withdrawable wei of a request an account is entitled to. This function is O(n), where n is the number of rounds of the request. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should only be used for interface display and not by other contracts.

params._beneficiary: The contributor for which to query.
params._request: The request from which to query for.

amountWithdrawable(uint256,address,uint2.return: The total amount of wei available to withdraw.

batchRequestWithdraw(address,uint256,uin.details: Withdraws rewards and reimbursements of multiple requests at once. This function is O(n*m) where n is the number of requests and m is the number of rounds. This could exceed gas limits, therefore this function should be used only as a utility and not be relied upon by other contracts.

params._beneficiary: The address that made contributions to the request.
params._count: Requests greater or equal to this value won't be withdrawn. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of request, iterates until the last request.
params._cursor: The request from which to start withdrawing.
params._roundCount: Rounds greater or equal to this value won't be withdrawn. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of rounds a request has, iteration for that request will stop at the last round.
params._roundCursor: The round of each request from where to start withdrawing.

batchRoundWithdraw(address,uint256,uint2.details: Withdraws rewards and reimbursements of multiple rounds at once. This function is O(n) where n is the number of rounds. This could exceed gas limits, therefore this function should be used only as a utility and not be relied upon by other contracts.

params._beneficiary: The address that made contributions to the request.
params._count: Rounds greater or equal to this value won't be withdrawn. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of rounds, iterates until the last round.
params._cursor: The round from where to start withdrawing.
params._request: The request from which to withdraw contributions.

betCount().details: Return the numbers of bets that were submitted. Includes bets that never made it to the list or were later removed.
betCount().return: count The numbers of bets in the list.

challengeRequest(uint256,string).details: Challenges the latest request of a bet. Accepts enough ETH to fund a potential dispute considering the current required amount. Reimburses unused ETH. TRUSTED.

params._betID: The bet ID with the request to challenge.
params._evidence: A link to an evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided or if not enough funds were provided to create a dispute.

changeArbitrator(address,bytes).details: Change the arbitrator to be used for disputes that may be raised in the next requests. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal periods and not reenter.

params._arbitrator: The new trusted arbitrator to be used in the next requests.
params._arbitratorExtraData: The extra data used by the new arbitrator.

changeChallengerBaseDeposit(uint256).details: Change the base amount required as a deposit to challenge a request.

params._challengerBaseDeposit: The new base amount of wei required to challenge a request.

changeGoalBetRegistry(address).details: Change the address of the goal bet registry contract.

params._goalBetRegistry: The address of the new goal bet registry contract.

changeGovernor(address).details: Change the governor of the token curated registry.

params._governor: The address of the new governor.

changeLoserStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Change the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the party that lost the previous round.

params._loserStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

changeMetaEvidence(string,string).details: Update the meta evidence used for disputes.

params._clearingMetaEvidence: The meta evidence to be used for future clearing request disputes.
params._registrationMetaEvidence: The meta evidence to be used for future registration request disputes.

changeRequesterBaseDeposit(uint256).details: Change the base amount required as a deposit to make a request.

params._requesterBaseDeposit: The new base amount of wei required to make a request.

changeSharedStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Change the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by parties when there isn't a winner or loser.

params._sharedStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

changeTimeToChallenge(uint256).details: Change the duration of the challenge period.

params._challengePeriodDuration: The new duration of the challenge period.

changeWinnerStakeMultiplier(uint256).details: Change the percentage of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the winner of the previous round.

params._winnerStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

constructor.details: Constructs the arbitrable token curated registry.

params._arbitrator: The trusted arbitrator to resolve potential disputes.
params._arbitratorExtraData: Extra data for the trusted arbitrator contract.
params._challengePeriodDuration: The time in seconds, parties have to challenge a request.
params._challengerBaseDeposit: The base deposit to challenge a request.
params._clearingMetaEvidence: The URI of the meta evidence object for clearing requests.
params._governor: The trusted governor of this contract.
params._loserStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the arbitration cost that the loser has to pay as fee stake for a round in basis points.
params._registrationMetaEvidence: The URI of the meta evidence object for registration requests.
params._requesterBaseDeposit: The base deposit to make a request.
params._sharedStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the arbitration cost that each party must pay as fee stake for a round when there isn't a winner/loser in the previous round (e.g. when it's the first round or the arbitrator refused to or did not rule). In basis points.
params._winnerStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the arbitration cost that the winner has to pay as fee stake for a round in basis points.

executeRequest(uint256).details: Executes a request if the challenge period passed and no one challenged the request.

params._betID: The bet index with the request to execute.

fundAppeal(uint256,uint8).details: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded. TRUSTED.

getBetInfo(uint256).details: Returns bet information. Includes length of requests array.

getContributions(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of a request.

getRequestInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Gets information on a request made for a bet.

getRoundInfo(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Gets the information on a round of a request.

isPermitted(uint256).details: Return true if the bet is on the list.
isPermitted(uint256).return: allowed True if the address is allowed, false otherwise.

requestStatusChange(uint256).details: Submits a request to change an address status. Accepts enough ETH to fund a potential dispute considering the current required amount and reimburses the rest. TRUSTED.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Overrides parent function to account for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Not able/wanting to make a decision".

submitEvidence(uint256,string).details: Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.

params._evidence: A link to an evidence using its URI.

withdrawFeesAndRewards(address,uint256,u.details: Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.

params._beneficiary: The address that made contributions to a request.
params._betID: The bet index submission with the request from which to withdraw.
params._request: The request from which to withdraw.
params._round: The round from which to withdraw.

devdoc.title: ArbitrableBetList This smart contract is a viewer moderation for the bet goal contract.
